# Finnish Language Learning with Music - Karakov

## Project Overview
Web application for learning Finnish through music and karaoke.

## Features
- Multiple difficulty levels (beginner, intermediate, advanced)
- Random song selection
- Bilingual interface (Finnish/English)
- Karaoke-style lyrics display
- Interactive music player

## Technology Stack
- HTML5
- CSS3
- JavaScript (Vanilla)
- Local Storage for preferences

## Project Structure
- `/css` - Stylesheets
- `/js` - JavaScript modules
- `/data` - Song database
- `/assets` - Images and media
